page.title: 12Sedlescombe's Events
page.content: The event of the year is the Summer Fete and Flower Show held on the last Saturday in July on the Pestalozzi Field. All local groups take part and many provide a float for a procession through the village. This is headed by the Flower Princess. Various other fetes are held by different clubs at other times on the Village Green. Morris dancers visit twice a year. The School traditionally holds a Christmas Market on the first Saturday in December, and a Strawberry Fair in the Summer. The Pestalozzi Village has an annual open day. There are Spring and Autumn Horticultural Shows. A Stoolball Tournament attracts other village teams every year.
